SELECT a1.CULTURE_NO , a1.CULTURE_TITLE, a1.CULTURE_CONTENT,a2.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickname,a1.CULTURE_REGDATE,a1.CULTURE_PICK FROM KOCO_CULTURE a1, KOCO_USERS a2 WHERE 1=1 AND a1.USER_NO = a2.USER_NO
AND a1.CULTURE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND a1.CULTURE_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND a2.USER_NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
ORDER BY a1.CULTURE_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KOCO_CULTURE a1, KOCO_USERS a2 WHERE 1=1 AND a1.USER_NO = a2.USER_NO
AND CULTURE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND CULTURE_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND USER_NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
SELECT * FROM KOCO_CULTURE ORDER BY CULTURE_NO DESC

SELECT a1.CULTURE_NO , a1.CULTURE_TITLE, a1.CULTURE_CONTENT,a2.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickname,a1.CULTURE_REGDATE,a1.CULTURE_PICK FROM KOCO_CULTURE a1, KOCO_USERS a2 WHERE 1=1 AND a1.USER_NO = a2.USER_NO AND a1.CULTURE_NO = #{cultureNo}
